fullForm: All India Entrance Examination for Design
eligibility: Candidates must have completed or be appearing for 10+2 (any stream) from a recognized board for undergraduate courses. For postgraduate courses, a graduate degree in any discipline is required.[4][5]
coursesLinked: Other Design Programs at ARCH College of Design & Business

faqs.question: What is the purpose of the AIEED exam?
faqs.answer: AIEED is a compulsory entrance exam for admission to design courses at Arch College of Design & Business, testing aptitude and attitude towards design through multiple stages including aptitude tests, creative ability tests, and personal interviews.[4][5]
